casebody.data:
ROSENTHAL LAW FIRM, LLC
v.
James COHEN. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2016. James Cohen, self-represented, in support of the petition. Edward Rosenthal, West Hartford, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 467 , 139 A.3d 774 (2016), is denied.

PALMER and ROBINSON, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
